## map() function

Creates a Parser that applies the given function to each value generated by the given parser.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function map<T, U>(parser: Parser<T>, map: (v: T) => U): Parser<U>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parser | <code>Parser&lt;T&gt;</code> | Parser to map over |
|  map | <code>(v: T) =&gt; U</code> | Function to transform values generated by parser |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Parser<U>`
